      protected ElementAssertion element(String xpath)
      Gives access to an ElementAssertion object for the HTML element identified by the given XPath expression.

      Gives access to an OutputAssertion object, enabling raw output-oriented assertions.

      Gives access to a PageAssertion object, enabling page-oriented (HTML) assertions.
